name: AuroraMania
description:
This is a  non-profit fan project, if you are against it message me for removal

This is a plataformer with rocket jumping mechanics based on Team Fortress 2, it has an open world with handmade rooms, 4 different bosses , colletibles and a main story about Aurora and her friends fighting monsters

Art assets,  programming logic and story  made by @aurora.fanboy of Instagram 

All rights to the songs used belong to Aurora
